name: Role With It
description:
Tutorial:
All dice will be re-rolled in the beginning of each turn.
Your next unit will receive stats based on the values of the dice.
You can choose to send in your unit this turn by clicking on it and placing it on a spot on the board, or you can lock dice by clicking them and skip your turn!  A locked dice will not be re-rolled when the next turn begins.

Music: Tomorrow by Scott Buckley – www.scottbuckley.com.au

This is an entry for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam
